attributes.additional_details:
To bring in a system where by all peoples leaving school take part in a extended term within the armed forces.
Bringing together people from all walks of life where they can learn to work side by side integrating and building a society where people can see each other on a socially level basis, and giving them a sense of wider community and patriotism that is currently missing in Britain today.
A system similar to that of Israel though tailored for the needs of a modern Britain, to help combat the rapidly increasing numbers of disaffected youth, who refuse to work for what they are given, and i say this as a young person watching my own generation is horror.
